item.description:
Usher in 2009 in sumptuous style at The Back Bay Gala (hosted by BEG - Boston Event Guide), at the Hyatt Regency Boston Hotel in downtown Boston.

Several of our members have attended prior BEG events (such as The Resolution Ball) and their events ROCK! So a bunch of us have already bought tickets, booked our hotel rooms and are keen for as many people as possible to join us for this awesome party:

Your night to remember starts with a cocktail reception and a scrumptious all-inclusive dinner.
Then, slide over to the dance floor as the live band, The Love Dogs, and a DJ help you dance the night away with swing, Motown, Soul, R & B, 70s, 80s, 90s and current top-40 dance hits.

All-Inclusive Dinner Package (7:30pm - 2am) includes:
An exclusive hors d'oeuvres reception starting at 7:30pm, complimentary cocktail reception and delicious dinner stations served from 7:30pm - 9:30pm (menu below), premium bar, dancing, midnight toast, entry into the grand ballroom, cash bar, gift bags and party favors.

PRICE: Only $179 + $4 service fee = $183 (The October & November discounts have expired).

NOTE: After the current discounted block of tickets sells out, price will rise to $205. After 12/20, price rises to $220. After 12/29, price will be even higher !!! Price the week of the event will be $250

**** The longer you wait to buy your ticket, the higher the price will be ****
**** Full price for this event will be as high as $250 this year ****
**** So if you want a good deal, do not delay buying your ticket!! ****

If you would rather skip the dinner and attend the reception and dance, or dance only, these options are available, and are cheaper than the full dinner package:
Reception & Dance and Dance Only Ticket Details

You need to buy your own ticket directly from Boston Event Guide at:
http://www.bostoneven...

Discounted hotel rooms are available at The Hyatt Regency Boston until 12/23/2008 for $199 (normally $390) by calling 888-233-1234 and mentioning the Back Bay Gala for the discount.
(NOTE: Parking of $12 for the evening or $30 for valet parking is not included.)

For more info on the hotel, see: http://regencyboston....

***** DINNER MENU IN DETAIL *****

Enjoy a welcoming reception with delicious passed hors d'oeuvres:

Risotto Arancini with Spicy Tomato Coulis
Peking Duck Roll with Hoisin Sauce
Miniature Chicken Wellington with Cabernet Reduction
Tandoori Chicken Satay with Cucumber Raita
Mushroom Phyllo Triangle

Salad Station:

Boston Bibb Lettuce with Great Hill Bleu Cheese
Locally Grown Tomatoes, Dried Cranberries and Cider Vinaigrette
French Served Apple, Endive and Feta Salad with Lemon-Thyme Vinaigrette
Arugula, Pear and Reggiano Salad with Chives and Pine Nut Pesto
French Served Spicy Greens with Preserved Lemon, Chick Peas, Parmesan and Peppercorn Vinaigrette

Pasta Station:

Wild and Domestic Mushrooms with Truffled Lunette Pasta in Porcini Mushroom Jus
or
Cavatappi with Roasted Fennel Sausage, Garlic Slivers and Julienne Tomatoes
or
Farfalle with Smoked Chicken and Broccoli in Roasted Tomato Vodka Cream
Served with
Freshly Grated Parmesan Cheese And Warm Garlic Bread

Carving Stations:

Bacon Wrapped Turkey Breast
Sweet Potato and Raisin Salad
Cranberry-Pecan Chutney and Bourbon Gravy
Yankee Corn Bread

Salmon En Croute
Shaved Fennel and Caper Salad
Garden Carrots Roasted with Fresh Thyme
Caper-Herb Tartar Sauce
Grilled Flatbreads

Pastrami Crusted Sirloin
Marbled Baby Maine Potatoes with Rosemary and Thyme Butter
Caraway Jus and Red Cabbage Slaw
Multigrain Loaf

Served with:
Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Chefâ€™s choice of seasonal vegetables

Desserts:

Lemon Mousse Tart wit Blueberry Compote
Individual Apple Pie with Caramel Sauce
Fig, Mascarpone and Biscotti Parfait
Chocolate Yule Log
Double Chocolate Tart with Cranberry Coulis

Served with Freshly Brewed Starbucks Coffee, Decaffeinated Coffee, and Assorted Tazo Teas
item.how_to_find_us: Will advise location for meeting up/some pre-dinner cocktails by e-mail on 12/31
item.name: New Year's Eve Party: Back Bay Gala
